name: Netfilms
desc: I built NetFilms using React and Next.js, creating a Netflix-like platform with a smooth and dynamic user experience. Movie data is fetched via an API, ensuring real-time updates and a rich content library. This project allowed me to enhance my front-end skills while working with API integration and modern web technologies

name: Blog
desc: I built this blog website using Next.js and React, focusing on clean and efficient design to enhance user experience. The platform dynamically fetches images via an API, ensuring a visually rich and engaging interface. My goal was to turn complex ideas into a seamless, user-friendly experience while continuously refining my skills with modern web technologies

name: Fylo
desc: I designed and developed the Fylo landing page using HTML and CSS, focusing on a clean and responsive layout. The goal was to create a visually appealing and user-friendly interface while ensuring smooth adaptability across different devices. This project helped me refine my front-end skills and attention to detail in web design
